title: Tuna cream cheese pasta bake
ingredients: ['250g penne pasta', '2 (185g) tins tuna in brine, drained', '3 to 4 tablespoons sweetcorn', '1/2 onion, grated', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 dash chilli powder or flakes', '1 to 2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 (180g) tub cream cheese', '8 hard boiled eggs, roughly chopped', '1 handful grated cheese, of your choice']
